name: Commons Network
goal:
Commons Network is a civil society organisation that works with activists, thinkers, pioneers and policy makers to tell stories, build networks and propose policies to support commoners and defend the commons throughout Europe.

CN focuses on the democractic stewardship of knowledge and the knowledge commons, ranging from open science to data management in the collaborative economy.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Culture, Development, Education, Energy, Environment, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade
euInitiatives: Horizon 2020,  Copyright Reform,  Development and relations with UN agencies, Renewable Energy,  Citizens Initiatives, Transparency, Participation and Accountability.
